Comment: The response provides a thorough explanation of the spiritual significance of the phrase "circumcision of the heart" in a Christian context, drawing from relevant biblical passages and highlighting the deeper meaning beyond external practices. It effectively addresses the concern by emphasizing the importance of internal transformation through faith in Jesus Christ. The only room for improvement would be to include further discussion on how this concept relates to the understanding of physical practices in modern Christianity.
